summary: Email correspondence regarding arrangements for victim Estela Vastardis to attend an FBI briefing in Florida on October 15, 2019. The email involves coordination between a trial attorney, an FBI victim services representative, and the victim's support person.

persons.name: Brittany
persons.context: Attorney representing client Estela Vastardis, coordinating her attendance at an FBI briefing.

persons.name: Angela
persons.context: FBI representative copied on email, coordinating logistics for victim attendance at briefing.

persons.name: Estela Vastardis
persons.context: Client of attorney Brittany, identified as a victim wishing to attend FBI briefing in Florida.

persons.name: Estella
persons.context: Support person for Estela Vastardis; contact info needed for office entry to the briefing.

connections.description: Brittany is the trial attorney representing client Estela Vastardis.
Estella is identified as a support person for victim Estela Vastardis.
Angela, as FBI Victim Services, is coordinating briefing access for victim Estela Vastardis.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: Scheduled FBI briefing for victims, which Estela Vastardis plans to attend with a support person.

keyFacts: Estela Vastardis is identified as a victim in the Epstein case and is represented by attorney Brittany.
An FBI victim briefing was scheduled for October 15, 2019, in Florida.
Victims were permitted to bring a support person to the FBI briefing.
Coordination for victim attendance involved FBI Victim Services and legal representatives.
